name: Puzzling Harvest
description:
Solve every-day farming tasks. Drive your combine harvester and harvest crops. Some efficiency might be required ;) 

Short instructions:

- Use arrows around combine to control where your harvester should move

- Harvester can only move to the tile in front or behind. However, you can also perform a 90 degrees turn on the target tile

- Harvest and deposit crops, however, mind your fuel. If running low, re-supply at a fuel pump (it's a red block, lol, I ran out of time sorry)

Note: WebGL player is kind of slow, builds are available for download.
